item.description:
** If 16 people attend the total will be $13/person **
** Please bring $10 plus 5 $1 bills in case fewer than 16 attend **

Split decision between Rose or Shiraz.
I say- ** Lets do both **.

We'll have 4 Roses and 4 Shiraz. Please let me know if you have a favorite Rose or Shiraz you would like to bring.


** Could a few people create or buy about 3-4 appetizers

The agenda is:
o Greeting wine
o Educational topics
-Rose
-Shiraz
o Tasting
o Appetizers
o Mystery Wine
o AWS News
.
Mike

AWS Meetup Group
item.name: The AWS Wine July Meetup
